summary: The weeks leading up to a young couple's wedding are comic and stressful, especially as their respective fathers try to lay their long standing feud to rest.
cast: Forest Whitaker|America Ferrera|Carlos Mencia|Regina King|Lance Gross|Diana Maria Riva|Lupe Ontiveros|Anjelah Johnson-Reyes|Charlie Murphy|Shannyn Sossamon|Tonita Castro|Anna Maria Horsford|Warren Sapp|Shondrella Avery|Sterling Ardrey|Skylan Brooks|Castulo Guerra|Joseph Mencia|Vivek Shah|Matt Sauter|Paul Costa|Shaun B'Laurent|Joaquin Pastor|James Lesure|Alejandro Patiño|Jacqueline Mazarella|Joseph Vassallo|Ella Joyce|Sy Richardson|Noel Gugliemi|Charles Grisham|Caroline Aaron|Mimi Michaels|Carlee Avers|Hayley Marie Norman|Gordon James|Gina Rodriguez|Gabriel Alvarez|Harry Shum Jr.|Hannah Douglass|Ronnie Medrano|Lais Pedroso|Del Spiva|Angel vonSumpter|Katrina Baker|R.R. title: La boda de mi familia
